com.undercamber

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.undercamber.Tag

  • public final class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create pre-defined groups of tests.

    Tests can be tagged in the call to TestManager.initialize( SubtestSequencingMode, String, SubtestContinuationMode, Prerequisite[], Tag[], Requirement... ) using this class. All of the tests with the same tag name are grouped together.

    When running Undercamber, the groups to be run can be specified by passing thier tag name in the command line, using the -tag1 or -tag2 argument.

      Create a new tag.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tag

        public Tag(java.lang.String name)
    throws UserError
        Create a new tag.

        This is equivalent to 
            Tag( name,
         true )
        Parameters:
        name - The tag name. A tag name cannot be zero length. A tag name must start with a letter or an underscore. A tag name can contain letters, digits, and underscores.
        Throws:
        UserError - If the name is not legal.

      • Tag

        public Tag(java.lang.String name,
           boolean includeSubtests)
    throws UserError
        Create a new tag.
        Parameters:
        name - The tag name. A tag name cannot be zero length. A tag name must start with a letter or an underscore. A tag name can contain letters, digits, and underscores.
        includeSubtests -
        • true: The subtests should be included in the group
        • false: The subtests should not be included in the group
        Throws:
        UserError - If the name is not legal.
